Uses of Class
org.springframework.jdbc.core.metadata.CallParameterMetaData

  • Packages that use CallParameterMetaData 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.jdbc.core.metadata
    Context metadata abstraction for the configuration and execution of table inserts and stored procedure calls.
